Failure Functions

generator

  • generator(subdivision: number): { areas: number[]; normals: [number, number, number][] }

  • Uniformly generate normals and areas on a sphere.

    see

    sphere in @youwol/geometry

    Parameters

    • subdivision: number

      The number of subdivision for the sphere

    Returns { areas: number[]; normals: [number, number, number][] }

    • areas: number[]
    • normals: [number, number, number][]
